radiant.translation[0].definitions[0].de: full of happiness and love, in a way that shows in your face and makes you look attractive
radiant.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She looked radiant in a white silk dress.
They were both radiant with happiness.
radiant.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a lovely day with clear blue skies and radiant sun
radiant.translation[0].definitions[2].de: radiant heat or energy is sent out in the form of waves
